      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(Main.Point p1,
                           Main.Point p2,
                           Piece[][] currBoard)
        Description copied from class: Piece
        this method basically shows whether the certain piece can move from point A to point B.
        Specified by:
        isValidMove in class Piece
        Parameters:
        p1 - first point where the current piece is
        p2 - the point where the current piece wants to move to
        currBoard - the current state of the board, with updated positions
        Returns:
        false if the move is invalid and true if it is valid.
